title: Trump cheers CBS for canceling Stephen Colbert's 'Late Show'
shortDescription: President Trump cheered the cancellation of "The Late Show with Stephen Colbert," saying he "absolutely loves" that Colbert "got fired."

title: Trump administration reopens hundreds of millions of acres for oil drilling
shortDescription: The Trump administration has reopened oil and gas leasing across hundreds of millions of acres of federal lands and waters.

title: Trump's diagnosis: what is chronic venous insufficiency?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was recently diagnosed with chronic venous insufficiency, but what is it?

title: Nobel laureates want to head off a nuclear war
shortDescription: See photos from the Nobel Laureate Assembly for Prevention of Nuclear War

title: WSJ report marks latest twist: Recent Trump-Epstein news, explained
shortDescription: A report detailed a birthday card bearing President Trump's name that was sent to Jeffrey Epstein more than 20 years ago. Here's what to know.

title: Trump orders release of Epstein files
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's ordering the release of some of the Epstein files because of the publicity the case is still getting.

title: House passes Trump's cuts to public broadcasting, foreign aid
shortDescription: Plus: Trump denies a report he wrote Jeffrey Epstein a lewd 50th birthday letter. And polling shows voters aren't happy about the case's handling.

title: Trump makes rare concession with Epstein records move
shortDescription: For a president known for punching back at critics, his move to release more Epstein records is a notable instance of bowing to their demands.

title: Trump, Newsom tangle over California's high-speed train
shortDescription: New rail projects in the United States typically take decades to develop.

title: Congress approves Trump's $9 billion cuts to PBS, NPR, foreign aid
shortDescription: The GOP-led House gave final approval to the spending bill just ahead of a Friday midnight deadline otherwise the money under the law must be spent.

title: Donald Trump denies report that he wrote Jeffrey Epstein a lewd letter
shortDescription: The Wall Street Journal reported the text of Trump's letter to Epstein was inside a hand-drawn outline of a nude woman.

title: Musk jabs at Trump in stream of social media posts on Epstein
shortDescription: After Trump described the Epstein saga as a "hoax," Musk wrote: "Wow I can’t believe Epstein killed himself before realizing it was all a hoax."

title: Trump officials tour Alcatraz, direct staff to help prison reopen
shortDescription: Attorney General Pam Bondi and Interior Secretary Doug Burgum visited Alcatraz, the infamous prison island that Trump has said he wants to reopen.

title: Trump diagnosed with chronic vein condition
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has been diagnosed with chronic venous insufficiency, a condition causing leg swelling.

title: Trump diagnosed with vein condition after noticeable leg swelling
shortDescription: Trump, 79, underwent medical tests to examine leg swelling and bruising on his right hand. Both conditions have been visible in recent photographs.

title: Trump against appointing special prosecutor in Epstein case
shortDescription: "The president would not recommend a special prosecutor in the Epstein case," White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said July 17.

title: Senate passes aid, public broadcasting cuts | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: New Trump policy that will keep immigration detainees locked up longer. | Listen to these and more stories on The Excerpt.

title: White House revokes $4B in funding for California's high-speed rail
shortDescription: The Trump administration has officially revoked federal funding for California's high-speed rail project.
